name: cotr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0
body: |- wb(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))))))

stmt.origin: cotrg(s0, s1, s2, c0, c0, c0)
stmt.pretty: cotrg(s0, s1, s2, c0, c0, c0)

body.origin:
|- wb(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s2, c0)
-| diffsc(s2, c0)
-| diffsc(s2, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s2, c0)

comment: Two ways of saying a relation is transitive. Definition of transitivity in [Schechter] p. 51. Special instance of ~ cotrg . (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-1996.)
